attributes.action: stop the  payment of  National  insurance
attributes.additional_details: as the govt. of the day the insists  on welfare  cuts to  those  most in  need, it  needs to  be  reminded  that  National  Insurance is paid  by everyone  by law & is  Insurance, not  a means  to  reduce  the  deficit & therefore  deny the  payout  of  Insurance, making  the  collection of  National Insurance  therefore  fraudulent
